articles.author: Mark Thompson and Chris Liakos, CNN Business
articles.title: Russia raises stakes in energy standoff by insisting on rubles for gas - CNN
articles.description: Russia has doubled down on its threat to cut off natural gas supplies to Western countries that refuse to pay in rubles, raising new concerns about an energy supply crunch and rationing in Europe.

articles.author: Duncan McLeod
articles.title: Vodacom South Africa MD to step down - TechCentral
articles.description: Vodacom South Africa MD Balesh Sharma is leaving the mobile operator after less than two years in the role to pursue a new opportunity in Europe.
articles.content:
Balesh Sharma
Vodacom South Africa MD Balesh Sharma is leaving the mobile operator after less than two years in the role. He has decided to pursue a new opportunity in Europe after two decades with … [+1587 chars]

articles.title: Ukraine: Kremlin demands rubles for gas - CTV News
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin issued a decree Thursday demanding payment for natural gas in rubles but appeared to temper the order by allowing dollar and euro payments through a designated bank, the latest twist over energy supplies that Europe relies on …

articles.author: Jack Ewing, Clifford Krauss
articles.title: Soaring Cost of Diesel Ripples Through the Global Economy - The New York Times
articles.description: Russia’s war in Ukraine has caused a steep rise in a fuel essential to truckers, farmers and industry. Europe is hardest hit.
articles.content:
Its not just the fuel we put into pickups, tractors, combines, said Chris Edgington, an Iowa corn farmer. Its a cost of transporting those goods to the farm, its a cost of transporting them away.
At… [+1616 chars]

articles.author: Lenin Ndebele
articles.title: Zimbabwe tourism sector set for take-off as European carrier launches new flight to Victoria Falls - News24
articles.description: German long-haul holiday carrier Eurowings Discover will fly into Zimbabwe's prime tourism destination, Victoria Falls, three times a week from Frankfurt.
articles.content:
• The German carrier will fly three times weekly from Frankfurt to Victoria Falls via Windhoek, Namibia.
  • Zimbabwe welcomes the new development as a timely boost for the country's touris… [+3075 chars]
